alert.note: Alert for West Slopes North Cascades and Passes (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 10 at 4:11AM PST until November 11 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 PM PST SATURDAY ABOVE 4500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 4500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet, with highest amounts above 5000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Cascade mountains of Whatcom and Skagit Counties, including the Mount Baker Ski Area and Rainy Pass. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: West Slopes North Cascades and Passes
